text: Rumyana Kostova (born 26 March 1962) is a Bulgarian rower. She competed in the women's eight event at the 1980 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian female rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Bulgaria Category:Rowers at the 1980 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Rumyana Kostova
